message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9000. I believe it's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth the investment. Let me know your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $8000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your acceptable range.
